mapper.sql: shpl.ht_pro_line_id, shpl.pro_line_id, shpl.pro_code, shpl.pro_name, shpl.pro_desc, shpl.factory_id, shpl.work_shop_id, shpl.status, shpl.create_user_id, shpl.create_time, shpl.modified_user_id, shpl.modified_time, shpl.option1, shpl.option2, shpl.option3, shpl.org_id, shpl.remark
mapper.select:
select , f.factory_name as factoryName, ws.work_shop_name as workShopName, u.user_name as createUserName, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, bo.organization_name from fantech_imes_v2.base_ht_pro_line shpl left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on shpl.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user s on shpl.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_factory f on shpl.factory_id=f.factory_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_work_shop ws on shpl.work_shop_id= ws.work_shop_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON shpl.org_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(shpl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shpl.pro_code like CONCAT('%', #{proCode}, '%')
and shpl.pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{proName}, '%')
and shpl.pro_desc like CONCAT('%', #{proDesc}, '%')
order by shpl.modified_time desc
